Description.Text: Situated in the heart of the city, AC Hotel Marseille Velodrome is a perfect gateway to discover Marseille. This is a modern and cosmopolitan hotel located only a few minutes from popular tourist attractions such as Parc Borély and the Basilique Notre Dame de la Garde and business districts. Famous Vélodrome Stadium is just few meters away. Beaches are accessible by foot (20min) or by public transport.
Oh Massalia offers Mediterranean cuisine in a trendy atmosphere. Large choice of restaurants in the immediate vicinity.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
